data.name: Distance - Soundtrack & Art Book
data.detailed_description:
This is the official Distance Soundtrack with music by Jordan Hemenway & The Quiggles!

54 tracks in both MP3 (320kbps) and FLAC formats. Features over two and a half hours of original music from Distance, including extended tracks and a few bonus tracks, all remastered exclusively for this release.

Also includes the Digital Art Book which showcases the evolution of Distance's art direction throughout its 6 year development (55 page PDF).

Files will be placed in your Distance folder in the Steam Directory:
- Soundtrack: "...Steam\steamapps\common\Distance\Soundtrack and Art Book"

Full track list:
- 01. Spectrum
- 02. Cataclysm
- 03. Diversion
- 04. Euphoria
- 05. Scratch
- 06. Convolution
- 07. Abyss
- 08. Remember
- 09. Embers
- 10. Shadows
- 11. Isolation
- 12. Gravity
- 13. Repulsion
- 14. Compression
- 15. Storm
- 16. Research
- 17. Abstraction
- 18. Ghost
- 19. Monolith
- 20. Ascension
- 21. Enemy
- 22. Negative Space
- 23. Instantiation
- 24. Lost
- 25. In a Long Forgotten Utopia
- 26. Through the Deepest Void
- 27. Storming the Horizon
- 28. The Sentinel Can Only Watch
- 29. While Shadows of Beasts Loom
- 30. Its Violent Heart Still Pulses
- 31. An Imperfect Rhythm
- 32. To Echoes
- 33. Tepid Pants
- 34. The Manor
- 35. Momenta
- 36. Apprehension
- 37. Continuum
- 38. Drivetastic
- 39. Phantom
- 40. Ground Zero
- 41. #650782
- 42. Insanity
- 43. Aftermath
- 44. Grime
- 45. Engage
- 46. Random Chord Something
- 47. The Alliance
- 48. Carol of the Bells
- 49. Society
- 50. Ka-Bam Son
- 51. Spooky Town
- 52. Machine 17
- 53. Machine 17 (The Quiggles Remix)
- 54. Stasis

data.short_description: The official Distance Soundtrack with music by Jordan Hemenway & The Quiggles! Features over two and a half hours of original music from Distance, including extended tracks and a few bonus tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or AMD Radeon HD 3830
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or AMD FX 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 (Lion)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 640M or ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 775M or ATI Radeon HD 5870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or AMD Radeon HD 3830
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or AMD FX 4.0 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
